description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Youâ€™re instinctively able to gather your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zBDW8giNGqbolXly]{nanite array} beneath you to help break your fall when said fall would otherwise break you. When your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.QoCQEVNtgMhsElwQ]{sheath array} is active, the surface on which you fall always counts as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#falling]{yielding} (Core Rulebook 400), converting the damage from the first 10 feet of a fall to nonlethal bludgeoning damage. In addition, when your sheath array is active, for every 5 by which your Acrobatics check exceeds the DC to avoid taking damage from the first 10 feet of a fall, you can ignore the damage from an additional 10 feet of falling.
